about_the_game:
Add a pet to your team with this pack, which gives you access to 4 pets that will follow you everywhere on the battlefield.

This pack contains:
  • A Frostheart Phoenix
  • An Ancestor Dwarf ghost
  • A hunting hawk
  • A sprite
detailed_description:
Add a pet to your team with this pack, which gives you access to 4 pets that will follow you everywhere on the battlefield.

This pack contains:
  • A Frostheart Phoenix
  • An Ancestor Dwarf ghost
  • A hunting hawk
  • A sprite

name: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Pet Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or AMD R9 290
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only

short_description: This pack gives you 4 emblematic pets from the Warhammer Fantasy universe.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
